authors.author: H.A. Hoffman von Fallersleben Joseph A. Seiss

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Fairest Lord Jesus! newline Ruler of all nature! newline O Thou of God and man the Son! newline Thee will I cherish, newline Thee will I honor, newline Thou, my soul's glory, newline Joy, and crown.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Fair are the meadows; newline Fairer still the woodlands, newline Robed in the blooming newline Garb of spring. newline Jesus is fairer, newline Jesus is purer, newline Who makes the woeful heart to sing.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Fair is the sunshine, newline Fairer still the moonlight, newline And all the twinkling, starry host. newline Jesus shines brighter, newline Jesus shines purer, newline Than all the angels newline Heav'n can boast.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Beautiful Savior! newline Lord of the nations! newline Son of God and Son of man! newline Glory and honor, praise adoration, newline Now and forevermore be Thine!
